attributes.action: British Citiznship Test MUST be harder
attributes.additional_details:
The British Citizenship Test is an absolutely a joke as it stands at the moment.........If we are serious about immigration, integration and who can become a British Citizen, it needs to be a lot harder.......at the moment our Citizenship test is pathetic and we are a laughing stock to the rest of the world

The government should make this test a lot harder. In Australia and America, you have to really know about the country and its history to be allowed in. See the American Citizenship test and then look at ours and compare.

Don't let the world laugh at us.
